channel.title: Program detected my crack, is there a better way to crack?
channel.description: I'm trying to crack a trial version of a Windows program called [Hot Alarm Clock](https://hotalarmclock.com/download/). I disassembled it with IDA and patched it, but now when I start the program, it says "File is corrupted! Hot Alarm Clock is infected by a Virus or cracked. Please install the program again." Is there a better way to do this?

item.title: Program detected my crack, is there a better way to crack?
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: Program detected my crack, is there a better way to crack?
